_header: The rich nor riches God ne hates / But them that for riches God forsakes
Note:
Wenzel (1978)
XWenzel, Siegfried. Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle English Poems. Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978, p. 181, separates from preceding verses. Cf. Walther (1963)
XWalther, Hans. Proverbia sententiaque latinitatis medii aevi. 6 vols. Göttingen, 1963-69, no.17493a.
Subjects: sermons, verse in; wealth, dangers of; translations
_description: On God’s attitude toward the rich, from the Fasciculus morum — one couplet

Bod187.First Lines:
Neiþer þe rychesseNe þe ryche man God ne
                    hatyþ…

Wenzel,  Siegfried.

                English Poems.

BodRawC670.Transcription:
The ryche ne rychesse god ne hatythBut who so for rychesse god
                    forsakyth
